Class Date

java.lang.Object
projects.ruclinic.enhancedgui.util.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
This class defines the Date data type that has the instance variables year, month, and day.
Author:
Michael Ehresman, Melissa Xuan

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Date()
    A default constructor to create the date as today's date.
    Date(String date)
    A parameter constructor that takes in a string formatted as mm/dd/yyyy: the date passed in is split into tokens then parsed into an Int and stored into the instance variables.
    Date(Date date)
    A copy constructor that clones a passed date object.

  • Constructor Details

    • Date

      public Date(String date)
      A parameter constructor that takes in a string formatted as mm/dd/yyyy: the date passed in is split into tokens then parsed into an Int and stored into the instance variables.
      Parameters:
      date - String date to be converted to int values

    • Date

      public Date()
      A default constructor to create the date as today's date.

    • Date

      public Date(Date date)
      A copy constructor that clones a passed date object.
      Parameters:
      date - date to be copied

  • Method Details

    • dayChecker

      private int dayChecker(int year, int month)
      Helper method to isValid() to determine the amount of days in the month.
      Parameters:
      year - year to be checked if leap year
      month - to be checked how many days
      Returns:
      THIRTY_ONE_DAY_MONTHS=31, THIRTY_DAY_MONTHS=30, FEBUARY_DAYS =28 or FEBUARY_DAYS_LEAPYEAR = 29

    • leapYearCheck

      private int leapYearCheck(int year)
      Helper method to dayChecker() to figure out if it's a leap year or not.
      Parameters:
      year - the year to be checked
      Returns:
      FEBUARY_DAYS =28 or FEBUARY_DAYS_LEAPYEAR = 29

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      A method that determines if the date is a valid calendar date by calling helper method dayChecker() to check the amount of days in the month.
      Returns:
      true if date is a valid calendar date, false if not

    • isToday

      public boolean isToday()
      A method to check if the appointment date is today.
      Returns:
      true if date is today, false if not

    • isPast

      public boolean isPast()
      A method to check if the appointment date is before today.
      Returns:
      true if date is before today, false if not

    • isFuture

      public boolean isFuture()
      A method to check if the appointment date is after today
      Returns:
      true if date is after today, false if not

    • isWeekend

      public boolean isWeekend()
      A method to check if the appointment date is on the weekend.
      Returns:
      true if date is on a weekend false if not

    • isInSixMonths

      public boolean isInSixMonths()
      A method to check if the appointment is within 6 months in the future from current date.
      Returns:
      true if it is within 6 month false if not

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date d)
      Checks year then month then date to determine which date is greater.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      d - the object to be compared to the current object
      Returns:
      current object is greater than (+), less than(-), or equal to other(0)

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object d)
      Checks if otherDate is an instance of Date then creates a tempDate variable and casts it to Date then compares.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      d - the date to be checked if it equals the current object
      Returns:
      true if equal, false if not

    • convertDate

      private Calendar convertDate()
      Converts this Date object to a Calendar object.
      Returns:
      Calendar object with the details of this Date
